summary:
Passionate Purchase Manager | A Decade of Mastery in Procurement, Sourcing, and New Product Development | Navigating the Global Supply Chain with Precision

🌐 Elevating the Art of Procurement:
Over a thrilling 10-year journey, I've orchestrated the intricate dance of Purchase, Sourcing, and New Product Development. From fine-tuning raw material planning to seamlessly handling critical imports of Electronic, Mechanical, Reagents, Blood Control, and Instruments, I've perfected the delicate balance of strategic acquisitions.

📊 Mastering the Numbers:
Expert in LC Documentation, Payments, and Clearance, I've harmonized operations with CHAs and Freight Forwarders. It's not just about the products; it's about the meticulous orchestration of logistics that ensures a flawless symphony in the supply chain.

💡 Bridging Disciplines for Optimal Results:
Collaborating closely with Quality, Finance, Production Planners, and Warehouse maestros, I've fine-tuned the supply chain orchestra. Together, we've optimized inventory, creating a seamless rhythm that resonates through every facet of the business.

🌍 Navigating Global Regulations:
From handling Advance Licenses to steering through Export Licenses (Non-Scomet) for restricted items, I've successfully maneuvered the complexities of DGFT matters. My expertise goes beyond the products; it's about mastering the regulatory seas.

🚀 Specializing in Excellence:
With specialties encompassing Material Planning, Import Management, and Supply Chain Mastery, I bring not just experience but a passion for excellence to every facet of the supply chain.

Let's connect and explore the exciting possibilities of transforming the ordinary into extraordinary in the world of Supply Chain Management

currentPositions.description:
# Develop New Vendors of critical raw material as well as for regular products to achieve company objective

# Develop Dental products in India under ‘Make in India” initiative   

#Under New Product Development of Sterility Monitoring vertical; develop Class 4, Class 5 Strips, Indicator Label and Bowie Dick Products under Make in India    

#Coordinate with vendors for timely availability of raw material as per production plan.

#Coordinate with planning team and demonstrated strong in inventory management 

#Vendor Visit, Audit and Evaluation of supplier time to time    

#Coordinate with custom Broker for custom Clearance of Dental Consumable Products as well as Raw Material for Sterilization Packaging.   

#Analyze expense ratio time to time and negotiate with vendors time to time based on volume

#Closely work with QC and IQC team about quality complaints of Raw Material as well as Finish Products

Achievement : Develop 20+ New Vendors for critical products with 40% cost optimization and improved lead time efficiency by 30% within 22 months, demonstrating prowess in procurement and supply chain management
currentPositions.title: Purchase Supply Chain Manager

fieldsOfStudy: Logistics, Materials, and Supply Chain Management
educations.schoolName: Institute of Management Development and Research (IMDR) ,Pune

headline: Sourcing | Vendor Development | Purchase | SCM | Negotiation | Import -Export | Global Logistics |

certifications.name: Lean Six Sigma: Define and Measure Tools

message.text:
𝙎𝙩𝙧𝙚𝙖𝙢𝙡𝙞𝙣𝙚 𝙎𝙤𝙪𝙧𝙘𝙞𝙣𝙜 𝙋𝙧𝙤𝙘𝙚𝙨𝙨 𝙀𝙨𝙨𝙚𝙣𝙩𝙞𝙖𝙡 𝙏𝙤𝙤𝙡𝙨 𝙖𝙣𝙙 𝙏𝙚𝙘𝙝𝙣𝙞𝙦𝙪𝙚𝙨

📝 Recently i was going through insurance plans according to my requirement, i was taking out points about from plans are good for me as per my requirement 

📊 I was identifying the pros and cons of the plans and finally i came to conclusion which is the best policy for me as per my requirement 

📌 In above situation most important how I came to conclusion which strategy I implement to finalize my requirement 


🛠 Understood the Need 
🛠 Service Provider Evaluation 
🛠 Maximum Cover Benefit 
🛠 Minimum Price/Premium 
🛠 Flexible Payment Term 
🛠 Maximum Number of people cover
🛠 After Sales Support 
🛠 Review and Feedback  
   

📋 Same all points I can relate in sourcing in Vendor Development, where buyer will secure maximum benefit and with the minimum risk 

📐 Along with after sales support which is very crucial like Streamline the supply, Minimize the Quality challenges, or machine Installation, calibration, or repair in CAPEX procurement

🏹 In Capex Procurement when buyer is in vendor development should always clear on terms and condition about IQ, OQ, PQ along with after sales support, may times seller intention is to sell the machine but not to give after sales support 

==========
 DM | Follow #shreyaschanekar to navigate these complexities and drive Vendor Relations, cost optimization and development, sourcing and procurement
 ==========
 
 #supplychain #sourcing #procurement #leadershipskills #importexport #teammanagment #supplychainmanagement #purchasesolutions #sourcetopay #inventorymanagement #sourcetopay #customs #inventorymanagement #spendanalysys #soursetopay  #negotation #capexprocurement

𝔻𝕒𝕥𝕒 𝕥𝕠 𝔻𝕖𝕔𝕚𝕤𝕚𝕠𝕟𝕤 : ℝ𝕠𝕝𝕖 𝕠𝕗 𝕊𝕡𝕖𝕟𝕕 𝔸𝕟𝕒𝕝𝕪𝕤𝕚𝕤



🏹 Recently I was watching a video of furniture store, where a customer spend more than Rs. 85000, and his intention was to buy budget furniture  

⚒ When he paid his charges that time that customer realized he shopped for without realizing the cost and planning 

⏺ In procurement buyer face many times such situation where buyer place purchase orders with out proper planning , buyer should always analyze the spend of all the category of High cost, Mid cost and Low Cost

⏹ All categories needs to be monitored and analyzed on periodic basis, It helps buyer to understood the past trend of expenses based on past trend buyer can make procurement schedule on critical, urgent, important basis   
     
▶ Sometime buyer does not focus on Mid value and least value products but buyer should monitor the procurement trend based on quantity of Mid value and least value products 

Instead of procuring on monthly basis if buyer procure 

⚓ Mid value with high consumption products once in two month 

⚓ Low value but high consumption products on quarterly 

💡 Buyer will get better deal in terms of price, delivery terms, Payment terms and supplier will also give better service he will keep his supplier on priority list, will give timely delivery, share solution to cut down cost of buyer       
Spend analysis helps accordingly    

✔ Order Planning 
✔ Data Analysis 
✔ Process improvisation  
✔ Material availability
✔ Timely Dispatches 
✔ Saves time and cost of all Departments

 ==========

𝔹𝕖𝕪𝕠𝕟𝕕 𝕎𝕠𝕣𝕕𝕤: 𝕋𝕙𝕖 𝔸𝕣𝕥 𝕠𝕗 𝔸𝕔𝕥𝕚𝕧𝕖 𝕃𝕚𝕤𝕥𝕖𝕟𝕚𝕟𝕘


🚀 still I remember when I was in school, family members used to sit in circle in late evening to pass the time, as that was no mobile phones, internet era, I always saw those old age people they always used to listens first of all the members and then express their thought and their thought was always best suggestion 
 

🔶But how they developed skills of active listening, In those days people were not having TV, mobile or any other entertainment instruments, so they always share their thoughts, views to each other, They developed many skills from one skill 

✔️ Communication Skills 
✔️ Listening Skills 
✔️ Relationship Skills 
 
💡 In procurement and Supply Chain above 3 skills always helps to archive your milestone but the heart of all the 3 skills is active listening skills, when we develop active listening as a buyer below 3 skills will get improve and achieve desired result  
       
👉 Understand Needs 
👉Identify Opportunity and Risk 
👉Improve Decision Making techniques

Recently I read book Go Giver by Bob Burg and John David Mann is a powerful parable about the secrets to success through giving. Here are five key points from the book relates to Procurement and Supply Chain 

The Law of Value: Procurement prioritizes sourcing suppliers who offer quality, innovation, and efficiency, aligning with the organization's long-term goals beyond immediate cost savings.

The Law of Compensation: Procurement serves both internal stakeholders and suppliers, fostering mutually beneficial relationships that lead to better outcomes for all parties involved.

The Law of Influence: By prioritizing win-win solutions and understanding the needs of suppliers and stakeholders, procurement builds credibility and influence, facilitating effective negotiation and collaboration.

The Law of Authenticity: Procurement operates with transparency, honesty, and ethical standards in all interactions, fostering trust and credibility with suppliers, stakeholders, and colleagues.

The Law of Receptivity: Procurement remains open to feedback, insights, and opportunities from suppliers and stakeholders, allowing for continuous improvement, innovation, and adaptation in procurement practices.

In procurement logistics is not very focus sector, but some time due to small mistake or mis-handling of cargo buyer will get the product in damage condition and it gets delay the production or buyer needs to procure the required material with high value from alternate supplier 
 
✔ Temperature Controlled Cargo : 

✒ Air Cargo: In Air Shipment Packing needs to be Air worthy according to cargo which maintains the temperature controlled of cargo, Cargo needs to be packed with sufficient gel packs to maintain required temperature 


✒ Containerized Cargo: In Containerized temperature controlled cargo Humidity, Open Air and temperature needs to maintain correctly to extend the life of Cargo.  


✒ Dry Ice Cargo: In Dry Ice Cargo buyer should inform service provider to change the Dry Ice after specific intervals of time to maintain the specific required temperature 

✔ General Cargo:   


✒ LCL Cargo : In LCL cargo, many times buyer does not prefer palletize cargo to optimize the packing cost in such case buyer should ask supplier cartons required with high busting strength so that carton won’t get damage


✔ Inland Transport: Cargo handling in Inland transport is always poor in part load transport; buyer should always try to find out the solution to get material in proper condition   


As forward-thinking buyers, recognize that mastering logistics is not just about staying ahead; it's about shaping the future of commerce. With a proactive approach and strategic investments in advanced technologies and partnerships

𝐒𝐮𝐩𝐩𝐥𝐢𝐞𝐫 𝐃𝐲𝐧𝐚𝐦𝐢𝐜𝐬: 𝐋𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐫𝐚𝐠𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐒𝐮𝐩𝐩𝐥𝐢𝐞𝐫 𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐧𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐬


🤝When we heard word Relationship we always think relationship between family members like Wife- Husband, Father- Son or daughter or between 2 friends  

⚠️In relationship many times we face some challenges 🎬 but we sort it with discussion, finding out the way of the problem  
 
Like the same supplier relationship in procurement & Supply Chain Management is most important🥇  

💼In my past organization used  shuffle their suppliers in procurement team, that time as a buyer, First I need to understand the supplier and develop the relations with that supplier  

I could get best positive result from the supplier after making strong relationship supplier

Benefits of supplier relationship management 

🔰Get Priority : Many times due to over packed production lines or due to some other problem, buyer might get receipt of material as per his requirement but here relationship with supplier works, Supplier will help to arrange the material on priority  
 
🔋Best Price : Many times due to global ups and down prices of Raw material gets change and that time supplier might ask for rate revision due to global disturbances, but with best relationship with the supplier he will pass on less price hike or he will keep the same price for few months.  
 
🏧 Flexible Payment Terms : Buyer will best 2nd most important benefit in Flexible payment term when buyer makes strong relationship with supplier, Buyer always wants better payment term either Open account 30, 60 days or CAD or DA , with the strong relationship buyer will get flexible payment terms   
  
🕵Get better solution on cost improvisation : many times buyer are looking for best solution in problem which he is facing in material, many times supplier suggest the alternate solution which helps the buyer either in cost improvisation or from quality view 

🛠️Remember: strong supplier relationships bring numerous benefits like reliability, quality, and innovation. Let's keep nurturing these connections, ensuring mutual growth and success .

𝐂𝐡𝐚𝐥𝐥𝐞𝐧𝐠𝐞𝐬: 𝐆𝐚𝐭𝐞𝐰𝐚𝐲𝐬 𝐭𝐨 𝐒𝐭𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐞𝐠𝐢𝐜 𝐀𝐝𝐯𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐞𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭
 
🌊 We always face challenges in our life, some challenges we face for long term some we face for short term 

🏆 But most important is how we face the challenges and how we convert those challenges into opportunities 

📌 As a procurement and supply chain specialist I can resonate through my experience how to the challenges help to convert into opportunities

▶ Understand the challenge: Analyse the challenge facing, Gain a deep understanding of the root causes and potential implications. 

▶Seek Opportunities within the Challenge: Look for hidden opportunities within the challenge itself

▶Innovate and Adapt: Implement innovation and be open to trying new approaches to overcome challenges.

▶Continuous Improvement: Implement learning and adaptation within your procurement team, where lessons learned from challenges are used to refine processes

▶Measure Progress: Monitor progress regularly define key performance indicators (KPIs) to track the effectiveness of efforts in turning challenges into opportunities. 

🎉 By adopting a proactive, strategic, and collaborative approach we can turn challenges into opportunities

𝑪𝒂𝒑𝑬𝒙 𝑷𝒓𝒐𝒄𝒖𝒓𝒆𝒎𝒆𝒏𝒕: 𝑹𝒐𝒂𝒅𝒎𝒂𝒑 𝒕𝒐 𝑪𝒍𝒂𝒓𝒊𝒕𝒚 

 
Few years 📅 before I was looking to buy Furniture for personal use,  I visited furniture market to understand the different product

🚒 Visited many suppliers to export the market, product and identify the exact product as per my requirement, after understanding and negotiation I booked my order and paid the advance to fulfill the orders 💹 

📐👷🏻‍♀️ As my requirements was customize so there was lead time, but after few days I got call from my supplier some more time would required to fulfill my orders and after many follow ups, visits finally my vendor delivers my orders ⌛ 
 

Today in CAPEX Procurement I follow most of the steps and process to complete organisation requirement 


📊 Budget Allocation: In Capex Procurement Budget Allocation is primary task, Buyer needs to close the deal with in defined budget


🌐 Market Research: Conduct thorough market research to identify potential suppliers, products, solutions, Price, Payment Term, Lead Time, Installation, Commissioning, After Sales that meet buyer’s requirements


💳 Arrange Quotation: Based on enquiry potential vendors submit detailed proposal including pricing, timelines, warranties, and other relevant information  


🥈Evaluation and Selection of Supplier: after screening the proposal based on price, lead time, Payment Term, Past Record buyer evaluate supplier for the project    


🏗️Contract Finalization : Based on discussion buyer and potential seller agrees terms and condition contract being finalize and along with Purchase Order detailed Work order raised by the buyer  


🖨 After Sales Support : In Capex Procurement After Sales Support from the supplier is always very important, As a buyer it is very important to remain product in working condition or should get repairs in shortest time.  
 
🚀 In the dynamic realm of capital expenditure procurement, the expertise of experienced professionals serves as the essential for success.  CapEx procurement professionals stand as indispensable stewards, driving value creation, innovation, and sustainable growth in an ever-evolving business landscape 🛬

𝐒𝐭𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐦𝐥𝐢𝐧𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐥𝐞𝐱𝐢𝐭𝐲: 𝐍𝐚𝐯𝐢𝐠𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐚 𝐂𝐥𝐞𝐚𝐫 𝐏𝐚𝐭𝐡 𝐢𝐧 𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐜𝐮𝐫𝐞𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭



⛵ Still I remember days when I was in school our family used to go for outing in every summer holiday 

📲That time no mobile phone was not there so we cannot even think of internet service 

💡Every time we need to take help of local resident to get navigate or need to take help of some one to understand the local language 

🧭 After taking help from local resident we could tackle the small but complex situation, in todays technology based world we even does not ask to take help for such situation 


🌐In todays fast paced world we faced many complex situation in daily working life. Many times sudden complex situation arise and some times due to interdependence  complex situation arise 


🛑In procurement and supply chain we always need to face complex situation, some times it might be due to non-availability of material or some time due to other interdependent situation 

🔰Tackling complex situations in procurement requires a combination of strategic thinking, effective communication, and problem-solving skills. Here's a step-by-step approach to handle such situations:   

How to tackle the complex situation    

✔️Understand the Situation: First understand the complexity of the situation. Identify all the factors contributing to the complexity, 
 
✔️Gather Information: Collect all relevant data and information related to the situation.  
 
✔️Assess Risks and Opportunities: Conduct a risk assessment to identify potential risks associated with the complex situation. 
 
 ✔️Develop a Strategy: Based on your understanding of the situation, develop a clear and comprehensive strategy to address .
 
✔️Implement Action Plan: Execute the strategy by implementing the action plan developed in the previous step. 
 
✔️Monitor and Adapt: Continuously monitor the progress of the procurement process and be prepared to adapt your strategy as needed. 
 
✔️Evaluate Performance: After the complex situation has been addressed, conduct a thorough evaluation of the procurement process to identify lessons learned and areas for improvement.
 
With the help of steps and leveraging your analytical, communication, and problem-solving skills, buyer can effectively tackle complex situations in procurement and achieve successful outcomes.

==========

title.text: Cost Efficiency Chronicles: A Procurement Odyssey

message.text: Lets understand the Foremost consideration of Cost in Procurement

ingestedContentSummary.description: Check out my certificate for “Operational Excellence Foundations”: https://www.linkedin.com/learning/certificates/cac46f535d5683a4477d5fdaaebdc8d026cedbea7008d79c00657c340188dd68.
ingestedContentSummary.fullText: Understand and apply operational excellence to improve your organization's processes, products, and services for sustained competitive advantage. Dr. Richard Chua, consultant, professor and certified Lean Six Sigma Master Black Belt trainer, explains the fundamentals of operational excellence-from key concepts and tools to methodologies and implementation best practices. He explains lean principles and shows how to eliminate variation, operationalize the voice of the customer (VOC), error proof, and build in quality at the source. He covers methodologies such as Lean Six Sigma (DMAIC), Kaizen, Design for Six Sigma (DMADV), and value stream management (VSM), and shows how to choose the right one for your application. He concludes by sharing implementation best practices to drive the right mindset, behaviors, and results for sustaining operational excellence. See more See less
ingestedContentSummary.title: Certificate of Completion

message.text: Just finished the course “Operational Excellence Foundations” by Richard Chua! Check it out: https://lnkd.in/dajpqCxq #operationalexcellence.
Just finished the course “Operational Excellence Foundations”! #operationalexcellence

𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐜𝐮𝐫𝐞𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭 𝐈𝐧𝐬𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭𝐬 𝐔𝐧𝐯𝐞𝐢𝐥𝐞𝐝: 𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐬𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐦𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐯𝐞 𝐑𝐨𝐥𝐞 𝐨𝐟 𝐒𝐩𝐞𝐧𝐝 𝐀𝐧𝐚𝐥𝐲𝐬𝐢𝐬 📊 

👯 Most of the people have habit to analyse their monthly spend and based on their analysis they plan their next month’s planning of spend 💹 

⚒ As a result every person will have clarity how much amount will be available with him for other than regular expenses  

💳 How Spend Analysis will help in Procurement and Supply Chain Domain?


📐 For procurement, organisation always allocated limited budget or funds to procurement and supply chain, as I explained above spend analysis is nothing but monitoring and try to decrease the spend costs, increase efficiency or improve supplier relationships

🔰 Understand the requirements:  To analyse the spend, buyer needs to understand the requirement or raw materials, products, Future trends of the material prises    


⭐ Develop more than One supplier for critical products: Buyer should always develop 2 or more than 2 suppliers for critical products as a result, buyer can have upper hand in negotiation of the of the price 

💥 Develop vendors nearby: Buyer should always try to develop suppliers nearby to the manufacturing unit as a result less transport will be charge by the supplier  

💡 Many times buyers place frequent orders of B or C type of products as a result extra cost, time, efforts needs to spend of everyone in the team , instead of placing frequent orders Min-Max can be fixed for the B or C type of the product      

🗓 In conclusion, a thorough spend analysis is not merely a financial exercise; it is a strategic imperative. By delving deep into procurement data, businesses can uncover valuable insights, identify cost-saving opportunities, and enhance supplier relationships. Armed with this knowledge, organizations can navigate market uncertainties with confidence, driving efficiency and sustainable growth in the long term.

𝗤𝘂𝗲𝘀𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗚𝗿𝗼𝘄𝘁𝗵: 𝗧𝗵𝗲 𝗣𝗿𝗼𝗳𝗼𝘂𝗻𝗱 𝗕𝗲𝗻𝗲𝗳𝗶𝘁𝘀 𝗼𝗳 𝗔𝘀𝗸𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗤𝘂𝗲𝘀𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀

 
My 6 years old 🙎‍♀️ daughter always asked many questions to me, she is always eager to learn and understand new concepts which she seen in digital world or she experience in her life 🚀  

With out hesitating she always ask N number of questions and many question she asked in such a way that we even does not think in such way
 
As small children is always full of curiosity and learning attitude, they never think what any one will say, they always do what they like or even they never thought before asking any question 

🌍 In the fast passed changing world, where technology, working patterns is getting change, same it is applied in Procurement and Supply Chain, where procurement guy always need to work on new products with upgraded 
technology 
  
Asking questions always useful in procurement or supply chain filed so that no word will be there between the lines, 

🔍 Many times potential vendor tries to clear all the doubts but sometimes he even does not want to ask the question 

🔧In recent time I was in communication with one of my potential vendor for CAPEX requirement, I was asking many questions regarding the machine, components that potential vendor said, he will connect me with service team for my doubts 

⛳Benefits of clearing doubts   
             
▪ Enhanced Understanding
▪ Increased Confidence
▪ Improved Performance
▪ Better Decision-Making
▪ Strengthened Relationships
▪ Continued Learning
▪ Problem Solving
▪ Reduction of Anxiety

 🏳️ In the journey of self-discovery, clearing self-doubt acts as a informative the path towards realizing our full potential. By confronting and conquering our inner uncertainties, we unlock the door to boundless opportunities, paving the way for growth, fulfillment, and unshakable self-belief.

𝗥𝗲𝗼𝗿𝗱𝗲𝗿 𝗣𝗼𝗶𝗻𝘁𝘀: 𝗧𝗵𝗲 𝗖𝗼𝗿𝗻𝗲𝗿𝘀𝘁𝗼𝗻𝗲 𝗼𝗳 𝗘𝗳𝗳𝗲𝗰𝘁𝗶𝘃𝗲 𝗜𝗻𝘃𝗲𝗻𝘁𝗼𝗿𝘆 𝗖𝗼𝗻𝘁𝗿𝗼𝗹 𝗦𝘁𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗲𝗴𝗶𝗲𝘀
 
 
I recently went to 👨‍🎓  school reunion, I was meeting with my school friends after almost 10-12 years,

🎭 Everyone exchanging his carrier growth stories with each other 
 
 After spending few happy movements we went to dinner counter 🥘 

♨️ As it was very late so everyone was feeling very hungry and after finishing  few rounds of starter we focused on main course, 

🔋 Though the food was looking normal but the taste was very authentic and after few rounds of main course someone asked to repeat some specific dish 

🗓️ Though it was normal week day but the hotel was quite packed with many people    

⌛ After spending almost half an hour still my friend was waiting for his order and by that time we had almost our dinner 

😮 After many follow up with the delivery guy his order arrived but why he needs to follow up with the delivery guy?

Was the order calculation 📱 was considered appropriate?? Why my friend needs to wait for his favorite dish??

🔈 The reason is when everyone was having lovely food no one was focused balance or remaining food and did not checked do we need to re order the specific dish or will it be sufficient for every one 

🎤 Same I relate with the planning and supply chain domain, if we missed any re order level, or we missed any product which is required for any specific production plan

Imagine what situation will occur. 


🔍 if  the required product gets stock out and lead time of the product is high  with high transit time due not availability of specific product below challenges could be occur 📉 

✔ whole production will get disturbed and many order will be piled up 
✔ Due to urgency need to purchased expensive product from local market or from other global market 
✔ need to spend expensive logistic cost 
✔ needs to be make advance payment to full fill those orders 
✔ loss of competitive price and advantage  

It's crucial to establish robust inventory management practices, including setting accurate reorder points, monitoring inventory levels regularly, and promptly placing reorder requests when needed. Additionally, investing in inventory management software can help automate these processes and reduce the likelihood of human error

̲𝙿̲̲𝚛̲̲𝚘̲̲𝚌̲̲𝚞̲̲𝚛̲̲𝚎̲̲𝚖̲̲𝚎̲̲𝚗̲̲𝚝̲ ̲𝙼̲̲𝚊̲̲𝚜̲̲𝚝̲̲𝚎̲̲𝚛̲̲𝚢̲: ̲𝙴̲̲𝚖̲̲𝚙̲̲𝚘̲̲𝚠̲̲𝚎̲̲𝚛̲̲𝚒̲̲𝚗̲̲𝚐̲ ̲𝚂̲̲𝚞̲̲𝚌̲̲𝚌̲̲𝚎̲̲𝚜̲̲𝚜̲ ̲𝚃̲̲𝚑̲̲𝚛̲̲𝚘̲̲𝚞̲̲𝚐̲̲𝚑̲ ̲𝚂̲̲𝚝̲̲𝚛̲̲𝚊̲̲𝚝̲̲𝚎̲̲𝚐̲̲𝚒̲̲𝚌̲ ̲𝚃̲̲𝚛̲̲𝚊̲̲𝚒̲̲𝚗̲̲𝚒̲̲𝚗̲̲𝚐̲


When I was in 🏫 school, my dad used to go on training purpose from their office once in 2-3 years, I always think why dad requires training as he is working well in his government office 


📽 I always asked my dad do you really learned in training center or just do formalities, he always explains me why training is important how it helps in his career growth 
 
🔑 Nowadays I can connect their thought why training is important and how it helps in career growth 📈   


🚀 In todays’ fast paced world, in Procurement and Supply Chain domain where day technology is updating, new products are getting invented for better life or manufacturers are developing alternate product which is better than existing product in terms of quality, product usage, low consumption etc… 

🌐 Purchaser always needs to update himself in technology, price trends of commodities, alternate products can be used to get better result with better function 
 
🖍 Identify and leverage opportunities for innovation
🖍 Enhanced understanding of procurement processes
🖍 Improved compliance with laws and regulations
🖍 Strengthened supplier relationship management skills
🖍 Enhanced Negotiation Capabilities
🖍 Cost Reduction Strategies
🖍 Better market knowledge and insights
🖍 Increased efficiency in procurement operations
 
⭐ The benefits of training in procurement extend beyond immediate improvements in processes and practices.. By staying abreast of industry trends, mastering new technologies, and refining their skills, they not only optimize procurement outcomes but also position their organizations for long-term success in a dynamic marketplace.
